data.name: Rise Of Titans
data.detailed_description:
Rise of Titans is a free to play online multiplayer strategy card game set in a mysterious mythological world of Zorocu. Embody your favorite ancient God, build unique decks, make powerful combos and control the environment to defend your civilization.

Be a Hero, become a God

Rise of Titans is a card game heavily based on strategy. Collect and choose between +100: 3 factions and 7 tribes, each with unique abilities and skills to combine and build a powerful deck of 30 cards. Play aggressively or control the battlefield, discover new card combos and strategies. Create your deck, create your game.
Prove you are worth of your title as a God in ranked games, try new decks and challenge your friends in duel mode and become the final Titan in tournaments.

The battlefield is your ally

Luck was never an option. In Rise of Titans, strategy matters. Plan in advance, foresee your enemy’s moves and counter them. 97 hexagonal positions and modifiable environment: Hide in forests, protect yourself in the mountains, destroy cities, create volcanoes. Outsmart your enemy and become the God among gods.

The mysterious world of Zorocu

A mysterious and powerful entity has managed to control and bend history to their will. The greatest heroes and gods have asked for many favors, but they are still waiting for their payment… Centuries have gone by and it’s time for them to be repaid in this mythological battle.The greatest Gods from ancient civilizations are now trapped in Zorocu, and to escape, they’ll have to fight to find eternal peace… or death. Will you incarnate Atenea, Greek goddess of wisdom and war; Ullr, the Norse god of archery and battle; or Isis, the Egyptian goddess of magic and spiritism?

Features

  • +100 cards and infinite number of combinations.
  • Embody your favorite mythological god: Atenea, Ullr or Isis.
  • Immersive and modifiable battlefield.
  • Mythological creatures reinterpreted in a new and mysterious world
  • Themed deck cards with different abilities and skills
  • Easy to play, hard to master

data.short_description: Rise of Titans is a free to play online multiplayer strategy card game set in a mysterious mythological world of Zorocu. Embody your favorite ancient God, build unique decks, make powerful combos and control the environment to defend your civilization.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 y 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.11 or latest
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12+ or equivalent
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
